channel.title: CVE Feed for Tad -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tad -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-41976|2024-08-04T03:22:25.770Z -- tad -- uploader
item.description: Tad Uploader edit book list function is vulnerable to authorization bypass, thus remote attackers can use the function to amend the folder names in the book list without logging in.

item.title: CVE-2021-41565|2024-08-04T03:15:28.977Z -- tad -- tadtools
item.description: TadTools special page parameter does not properly restrict the input of specific characters, thus remote attackers can inject JavaScript syntax without logging in, and further perform reflective XSS attacks.

item.title: CVE-2021-41564|2024-08-04T03:15:29.139Z -- tad -- tad%20honor
item.description: Tad Honor viewing book list function is vulnerable to authorization bypass, thus remote attackers can use special parameters to delete articles arbitrarily without logging in.

item.title: CVE-2021-41974|2024-08-04T03:22:25.807Z -- tad -- tad%20book3
item.description: Tad Book3 editing book page does not perform identity verification. Remote attackers can use the vulnerability to view and modify arbitrary content of books without permission.

item.title: CVE-2021-41566|2024-08-04T03:15:29.209Z -- tad -- tadtools
item.description: The file extension of the TadTools file upload function fails to filter, thus remote attackers can upload any types of files and execute arbitrary code without logging in.

item.title: CVE-2021-41568|2024-08-04T03:15:28.906Z -- tad -- tad%20web
item.description: Tad Web is vulnerable to authorization bypass, thus remote attackers can exploit the vulnerability to use the original function of viewing bulletin boards and uploading files in the system.

item.title: CVE-2021-41563|2024-08-04T03:15:29.138Z -- tad -- tad%20book3
item.description: Tad Book3 editing book function does not filter special characters. Unauthenticated attackers can remotely inject JavaScript syntax and execute stored XSS attacks.

item.title: CVE-2021-41975|2024-08-04T03:22:25.666Z -- tad -- tadtools
item.description: TadTools special page is vulnerable to authorization bypass, thus remote attackers can use the specific parameter to delete arbitrary files in the system without logging in.

item.title: CVE-2021-41567|2024-08-04T03:15:29.080Z -- tad -- uploader
item.description: The new add subject parameter of Tad Uploader view book list function fails to filter special characters. Unauthenticated attackers can remotely inject JavaScript syntax and execute stored XSS attacks.
